pageContent: Objective: To analyse oncological and functional outcomes of salvage radical prostatectomy (SRP) in patients with recurrent prostate cancer and to compare outcomes of patients within and outside the European Association of Urology (EAU) guideline criteria (organ-confined prostate cancer ≤T2b, Gleason score ≤7 and preoperative PSA level <10 ng/mL) for SRP.

metaData.source:
Is There Use for FDG-PET in Prostate Cancer?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27825430/
